beer.beer_description:
Birra chiara di colore giallo opalescente.
Al naso ha un’impronta inusuale, si avvertono bene note agrumate e iodate.
In bocca le sensazioni di sapidità e acidità ben si amalgamano, rendendo questo prodotto unico e estremamente piacevole.
Grazie a queste caratteristiche la birra risulta molto beverina.

items.badge_description: Enjoying a nice Night Out on the town? Thanks for taking untappd along.

user.bio:
Un sommelier della birra che prende tutto alla leggera! 
A beer sommelier who takes everything easy!

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 20 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 5!

Some may argue that wine is better than beer, especially in a country so well known for its vineyards. We all know they’re wrong. Cheers! That’s 55 different beers from a brewery in Italy. Try 5 more for Level 12.

items.checkin_comment: Italian reissun backlogista. Maistuu siltä kun menee merivettä nenään ja se polttaa vielä tunnin jälkeenkin poskionteloissa. Hyi faan.

items.badge_description: Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 15 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 4!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 15 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 4!

beer.beer_description:
Birra chiara di colore giallo opalescente.
Al naso ha un’impronta inusuale, si avvertono bene note agrumate e iodate.
In bocca le sensazioni di sapidità e acidità ben si amalgamano, rendendo questo prodotto unico e estremamente piacevole.
Grazie a queste caratteristiche la birra risulta molto beverina.

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 195 check-ins with a photo.

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 115 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 24!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 15 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 4!

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 5 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 2.

items.badge_description: Planning on calling out tomorrow? If not, we’ll be sure to have some coffee ready for you! Drink 5 beers during the week after 10PM (to midnight).
You raise your glass so much you barely have time to drink it! Cheers! Toast to 15 check-ins in a month.

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 5 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 2.

Some may argue that wine is better than beer, especially in a country so well known for its vineyards. We all know they’re wrong. Cheers! That’s 15 different beers from a brewery in Italy. Try 5 more for Level 4.

user.bio:
Life is too short to drink industrial beer!
Fav styles: IPA/APA/DIPA/BIPA/ISA, Stout/Porter/IS/IP. New beers everyday.

items.checkin_comment: Doftar friskt med stickande citrus. Smakar härligt lent av salt tillsammans med låg sylighet som är svår att bestämma. Gose med havsalt 😋.

items.comment: Beskrivningen låter lite som Brekeriets "Sour & Salt". Den är fin! :)

items.badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 5 different venues categories as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 2!
It takes the perfect amount light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 125 check-ins with a photo.
